overview: Omid joined EQAL as the Director of Operations in 2012 and was quickly promoted to Vice President. He has over 15 years of sales and operations management experience working in a variety of industries including: retail, apparel, home-improvement, as well as being an entrepreneur. Omid graduated Summa Cum Laude with a Business Management degree and an MBA with a Marketing focus from Woodbury University. A city of Los Angeles native, Omid is an avid Lakers fan and loves to spend his free time at the beach, participating in extreme sports, and teaching Salsa Dancing as Adjunct Faculty at Los Angeles Valley College.
